wikipedia_page.main: Oluwatobi Fabian Shobowale Akintunde "Tobi" Sho-Silva (born 27 March 1995) is an English professional footballer who plays for Sutton United as a forward.

link_mentions.page: Charlton Athletic F.C. Under-23s and Academy

response: In mid-2013, Holmes-Dennis was called up to the England U18 squad, alongside Tobi Sho-Silva. He made his England's debut on 6 March 2013, alongside Sho-Silva, in a 1–0 defeat to Belgium U18.
